title: Is DC Pandey a good book for beginners (after the NCERT)? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: Absolutely! DC Pandey books set the foundation which is higher than NCERT. For JEE MAINS aspirants, I would recommend DC Pandey books as well as NCERT EXEMPLAR books. They are necessary too but many fail to do them. Do not go beyond them or you will mess up. For JEE Advanced aspirants, I would recommend DC Pandey books and NCERT Exemplar books only for building your foundation if you think it is weak for very high level books like Cengage, especially if you do not study at a coaching institute.  See ya Good Human

If you already have DC Pandey then DC Pandey is a good book but if you do not have DC Pandey then it is better to solve HCV first because HC Verma is a book which is recommended by mostly teachers to be done after NCERT . By the way DC Pandey is a good book for physics .
